content: द्वैध {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (धी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) Two-fold, double. --धं {@--1@} Duality, two-fold nature or state. {@--2@} Separation into two parts. {@--3@} Double resource, secondary reserve. {@--4@} Diversity, difference, conflict, contest, variance; श्रुतिद्वैधं तु यत्र स्यात् तत्र धर्मावुभौ स्मृतौ <ls>Ms. 2. 14</ls> <ls n="Ms.">9. 32</ls>; <ls>Y. 2. 78.</ls> {@--5@} Doubt, uncertainty; <ls>Bg. 5. 25</ls>; <ls>Ve. 6. 44.</ls> {@--6@} Double-dealing, duplicity, one of the six modes of foreign policy; see द्वैधीभाव below and गुण. {@--7@} Contradiction. --धं {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In two parts. {@--2@} In two ways, doubly.
